item.title: Introduction to Data Science with Python
item.description:
Description

Wish to perform Data Science but donâ€™t know how to? Have a dataset that you really want to analyze but not sure how to start? This hands-on session teaches how to explore datasets, use Machine Learning algorithms and derive insights from models using popular Python tools like Jupyter, pandas, sklearn and numpy. Aimed at budding data scientists with prior programming experience in any language.
item.dc:creator: Grishma Jena
